message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to us due to its unique features, quality, and the time invested in its creation. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. Considering its worth, we're extending an exclusive offer to you at this price. Please let us know if you're interested in exploring further.
